## How to use {targets}?


-   Setup `_targets` file

```{.r}
targets::use_targets()
```
-   Run pipeline
```{.r}
targets::tar_make()
```
-   Visualize pipeline
```{.r}
targets::tar_visualnetwork()
```

::: notes
-  Formal pipeline tool
-  What does this mean?
   - Dependency management
   - Caching
   - Visualization of workflows
   
:::
